digraph LastPassBreach{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];LastPass[label="LastPass", shape=ellipse, style=filled, color=lightblue];Breach[label="Breach", shape=ellipse, style=filled, color=red];August2022[label="August 2022 Incident

(US Law)", shape=box, style=filled, color=lightpink];UserAction[label="User Action
